name: @cmgzone/gitu-cli
description: Command-line interface for Gitu Universal Assistant

scripts.package:bin:win: npm run bundle && pkg dist-bundle/gitu.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist-bin/gitu-win-x64.exe
scripts.package:bin:linux: npm run bundle && pkg dist-bundle/gitu.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist-bin/gitu-linux-x64
scripts.package:bin:mac: npm run bundle && pkg dist-bundle/gitu.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist-bin/gitu-macos-x64
